channel.title: My List of Good Movies :)
channel.description:
From here: http://goons.freepgs.com/stuff.php?p=Good_Movies
This is a list my dad and I made so we wouldn't forget the good movies that we enjoyed. I forget how many are in this list, a little over 100 I think. We are adding about 50 more lol, we forgot some really good Clint Eastwood movies!!! :o
Anyways, click on the link above to see what the movies are about. Sorry I couldn't add them here, if html was allowed I would. But there is no way I'm creating a link for each of these movies... again .. in bbcode lol.
------------------------------------------------------------------------- # 48 Hours (Series) - Eddie Murphy, Nick Nolte # 6th Day, The - Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Rapaport # Ace Ventura Pet Detective (Series) - Jim Carrey # Adventures of Robin Hood, The (Old) - Errol Flynn # A Fistful of Dynamite - James Coburn, Rod Steiger # After the Sunset - Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek # Analyze This (Series) - Robert Dinero, Billy Crystal # Animal House - John Belushi, Tim Matheson # Back to School (Old) - Rodney Dangerfield # Bachelor Party - Tom Hanks # Banger Sisters, The - Goldie Hawn, Susan Sarandon # Bedazzled - Elizabeth Hurley, Brendan Fraser # Best Seller - James Wood, Brian Dennehy # Beverley Hills Cop (Series) - Eddie Murphy # Bird on a Wire - Mel Gibson, Goldie Hawn # Blame it on Rio - Michael Caine, Joseph Bologna # Blind Fury - Rutger Hauer, Terry O'Quinn # Boys from Brazil, The - Gregory Peck, Laurence Olivier # Butterfly Effect, The - Ashton Kutcher, Melora Walters # Casino - Robert Dinero, Joe Pesci # Carlito's Way - Al Capino, Sean Penn # Cellular - Chris Evans, Kim Basinger # Chances Are - Robert Downey Jr, Cybill Shepherd # Cliffhanger - Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow # Congo - Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh # Cry-Baby - Johnny Depp, Amy Locane # Death Wish (Series) - Charles Bronson, Hope Lange # Demolition Man - Sylvester Stalone, Wesley Snipes # Desperado - Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek # Devil's Advocate, The - Al Pacino, Keanu Reeves # Die Hard (Series) - Bruce Willis # Dirty Harry (Series) - Clint Eastwood # Ferris Bueler's Day Off - Matthew Broderick # For a Few Dollars More - Clint Eastwood # Frantic - Harrison Ford # French Connection (Series) - Gene Hackman # French Kiss - Meg Ryan # Frequency - Dennis Quaid # Fugitive, The - Harrison Ford # Fun With Dick and Jane (Old) - George Segal, Jane Fonda # Ghost Busters - Bill Muray, Dan Aykroyd # Godfather, The (Series) - Marlon Brando, Al Pacino # Good Fellas - Robert Deniro, Joe Pesci # Graduate, The - Dustin Hoffman # Great Escape, The - Steve Mcqueen # Groundhog Day - Bill Murray # Hatari - John Wayne # Heat - Robert Deniro, Al Pacino # Heat (Old) - Burt Reynolds # Her Aliby - Tom Selleck # History of the World Part 1 - Mel Brooks # Insomnia - Al Pacino, Martin Donovan # In the Mood - Patrick Dempsey, Talia Balsam # James Bond Series - Pierce Brosnan, Sean Connery # Kelly's Heroes - Clint Eastwood # Kramer vs Kramer - Dustin Hoffman # Last Samurai, The - Tom Cruise # Laws of Attraction - Pierce Brosnan # Lethal Weapon Series - Mel Gibson, Danny Glover # Longest Day, The - John Wayne, Richard Burton, (All the good old actors) # Man on Fire - Denzel Washington # Me, Myself & Irene - Jim Carrey, RenÃ©e Zellweger # Mission Impossible - Will Smith # Monty Python and the Holy Grail - Graham Chapman # Mummy, The (Series) - Brendan Fraser # Murder at 1600 - Wesley Snipes # My Big Fat Greek Wedding - Nia Vardalos, Michael Constantine # My Fair Lady - Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison # My Teacher's Wife - Jason London # Out of Time - Denzel Washington # Pink Panther (Old, Series) - Peter Sellers # Pirates of the Caribbean (Series) - Johnny Depp # Planet of the Apes (Old, Series) - Charlton Heston # Pretty Woman - Richard Gere, Julia Roberts # P.S. - Topher Grace # Quiet Man, The - John Wayne # Recruit, The - Al Pacino, Colin Farrell # Robin Hood Men in Tights - Cary Elwes, Richard Lewis # Rundown, The - The Rock # Rush Hour (Series) - Jackie Chan # Saturday Night Fever - John Travolta # Scarface - Al Pacino # Serpico - Al Pacino # See No Evil, Hear No Evil - Richard Pryor, Gene Wilder # Serving Sara - Elizabeth Hurley, Mathew Perry # Shaun of the Dead - Simon Pegg # Showtime - Eddie Murphy, Rober DeNiro # Sin City - Bruce Willis # Six Days Seven Nights - Harrison Ford, Anne Heche # Sound of Music - Christopher Plummer, Julie Andrews # Spies like us - Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd # Star Wars (Old, Series) - Harrison Ford # Tears of the Sun - Bruce Willis # Throw Momma from the Train - Danny Devito, Billy Crystal # Time Cop - Jean-Claude Van Damme # Total Recall - Arnold Schwarzenegger # Trading Places - Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd # Troy - Brad Pitt # Turner & Hooch - Tom Hanks # Two Mules for Sister Sara - Clint Eastwood # Under Siege - Steven Sigal # Von Ryan's Express - Frank Sinatra # What Women Want - Mel Gibson # Where Eagles Dare - Clint Eastwood, Richard Burton # White Men Can't Jump - Wesley Snipes # Who Am I? - Jackie Chan # You've got mail - Meg Ryan, Tom Hanks -------------------------------------------------------------------------
~Ron :D

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Spaceballs is a funny paraody of star wars, slc punk is kind’ve a stoner/anarchist comedy lol, rose red is a good (i guess you would say0 horror movie, House on Haunted Hill is really cool but weird, Accepted is funny, and jackass i just found funny because they’re so dumb

Read full topic

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Spaceballs, - Never saw it.

SLC Punk, - Never saw it.

Saving Private Ryan, - Never saw it.

XXX (the movies not porn!), - Saw it, but didn’t like it. That black dude’s nostils kept flaring and making me laugh lol. What’s his name? Ice Tee? Ice Cube or something.

Rose Red, - Never saw it.

House on Haunted Hill, - Never saw it.
The Matrix, - Good movie!
Farenheit 911, - Never saw it, I have enough info and probably more info that movie has about Bush and Dick. But I coudl rant on for forever about that lol/
Accepted, - Never saw it.
Jackass… - NO WAY
theres more but i cant think right now…
[/quote]

I’m going to add some more to the list.

Mr. Nice Guy - Jackie Chan
Ransom - Mel Gibson

Read full topic

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

It’s cause of the person playing the role… and besides the way the “stupid humor” was used it was quite funny.

Yeah that’s what I meant.

There is actually funny stupid humor, and then there is really stupid humor which doesn’t really make you laugh. Like the part in Ace Ventura when he got stuck in that Rubber/Metal Rhino and he was trying to come out using his finger lol. That was, I guess, Stupid, but it was very funny.

But when Napoleon Dynomite, says… Ihhhdiiieet! (Idiot), It just makes me wanna kill him lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Not that I can argue with that [size=1pt]well said[/size]statment, but Ace Ventura is REAL stupid humor. Oh well, let’s not argue over Jim [size=0pt]because you can’t win any arguement, you dumb ho!!![/size]

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye95, post:31, topic:2328”][quote author=Ron link=topic=2482.msg233607#msg233607 date=1157934083]
No the movies I don’t like include that one lol. Sorry but I just really… really hate stupid humor.
[/quote]Do I see Ace Ventura on that list? :|[/quote]
Ace Ventura is better in not so much as stupid humor, it’s actually funny.

In reality if I hear one of those dumb chuck noris jokes, I feel like hitting someone. That is a fucking STUPID JOKE. The way Jim Carrey played Ace Ventura was hilarious and is always enjoyable. Anyone who doesn’t like the Ace Ventura series is obviously a prune.

Read full topic

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:22, topic:2328”]Wow can’t believe I left out the movie, The Terminator. Yeah terminator 3 sucked. Not even close to the first 2.

I never saw family guy the movie, but I heard it was good. South park was kind of fun. A lot of parts I did and did not like. Mean Girls just made me puke lol. I really disliked Mean Girls. Lindsay Lohan should go into porno or something, not these weird teen movies filled with drama no one ever feels in real teenage life. :rolleyes:

But a good crime action film would be Serpico with Al Pacino. If you see that, you will love it! Also Marathon Man is a very good movie. 48 hours with Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte and there are quite a few good ones. I’ll go through the list again, and add in Crime, Comedy, Romance, Musical, etc later. Too much school work.

Enjoy the movies!

PS: Just downloaded History of the World part 1! This movie rules![/quote]

Lawl thanks XD

Read full topic

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow can’t believe I left out the movie, The Terminator. Yeah terminator 3 sucked. Not even close to the first 2.

I never saw family guy the movie, but I heard it was good. South park was kind of fun. A lot of parts I did and did not like. Mean Girls just made me puke lol. I really disliked Mean Girls. Lindsay Lohan should go into porno or something, not these weird teen movies filled with drama no one ever feels in real teenage life. :rolleyes:

But a good crime action film would be Serpico with Al Pacino. If you see that, you will love it! Also Marathon Man is a very good movie. 48 hours with Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte and there are quite a few good ones. I’ll go through the list again, and add in Crime, Comedy, Romance, Musical, etc later. Too much school work.

Enjoy the movies!

PS: Just downloaded History of the World part 1! This movie rules!

Read full topic

item.title: My List of Good Movies :)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Some of my favourites:

Pulp Fiction
Die hard (all of them)
American Pie (all of them)
Goodfellas
Lucky Number Slevin
Fight Club
Predator (both of them, much prefer the first though)
40 year old virgin
Meet the parents
Meet the fockers
Midnight Run
Mean Girls (rofl it’s crap but I like it :$)
Escape from Alcatraz
South Park (the movie)
Family Guy (the movie)
Total Recall
Terminator (1 and 2, 3 suxed)

And I probably got a whole lot more but those are the ones I can remember, btw Ron can you recommend me any good crime/action films?

Read full topic
